mapper.insert: insert into city_board (subject, unum, cbcontent, cbphoto, cbwriteday, city1, city2) value (#{subject}, #{unum}, #{cbcontent}, #{cbphoto}, now(), #{city1}, #{city2})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user INNER JOIN city_board ON user.unum = city_board.unum WHERE user.unum = #{unum}
